channel.title: Help me PLEASE! My client.java is messed up! Please help me
channel.description:
Here is the error code I get from the compiler -
[code=java]client.java:16379: missing method body, or declare abstract public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot); { ^ client.java:16381: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client if (playerItemsN[slot] != 0 && droppedItem != -1 ^ client.java:16381: cannot find symbol symbol : variable droppedItem location: class client if (playerItemsN[slot] != 0 && droppedItem != -1 ^ client.java:16382: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client && playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1) { ^ client.java:16382: cannot find symbol symbol : variable droppedItem location: class client && playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1) { ^ client.java:16382: incomparable types: int and <nulltype> && playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1) { ^ client.java:16383: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[slot] - 1, absX, absY, ^ client.java:16384: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client playerItemsN[slot], playerId, false); ^ client.java:16386: cannot find symbol symbol : variable droppedItem location: class client deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); ^ client.java:16386: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); ^ client.java:16386: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slot location: class client deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 11 errors [/code]

item.title: Help me PLEASE! My client.java is messed up! Please help me
